cause.description:
To those who follow, we embrace thee. To all else, thou shalt recieveth a roundhouse kick to the face.
1. God wanted to create the world in ten days. Chuck Norris gave Him seven.
2. There is no such thing as evolution; just a list of animals Chuck Norris allows to live
3. We must spread these beliefs and principles, and convert others.
cause.mission: Spread Awareness of Chuck Norris and His Doings
cause.name: The First Church of Chuck Norris
